list.title: 获取验证token
list.desc:
入参：
{"username":"admin","password":"wangwei2048","authcode":null}

返回结果：
{
  "status": 200,
  "message": "OK",
  "devMessage": null,
  "data": {
    "access_token": "5dba38e5bbb648f9821833610411972d",     // 该结果作为其他接口的header必传，参数名为：Admin-Authorization
    "expired_in": 86400,
    "refresh_token": "ce0b71dd4c4c4e6c9ce173f4e97d43f2"
  }
}
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"number"},"message":{"type":"string"},"devMessage":{"type":"null"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"access_token":{"type":"string","description":"// 该结果作为其他接口的header必传，参数名为：Admin-Authorization"},"expired_in":{"type":"number"},"refresh_token":{"type":"string"}}}}}
